description: Extension of Donor class for Humans.

rdfs:label.description: A human-readable name for the entity.

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the JSON Schema that defines this object.

TerraCore:hasSibling.title: hasSibling
TerraCore:hasSibling.description: A property that identifies full genetic siblings.

TerraCore:hasFamilyID.title: hasFamilyID
TerraCore:hasFamilyID.description: A property identifies the family with whom this Donor is affiliated.

TerraCore:hasHalfSibling.title: hasHalfSibling
TerraCore:hasHalfSibling.description: A property that identifies genetic half siblings.

TerraCore:hasParent.title: hasParent
TerraCore:hasParent.description: A property that identifies genetic parents.

TerraCore:hasDiagnosis.title: hasDiagnosis
TerraCore:hasDiagnosis.description: A property that identifies a Diagnosis including provenance and the disease or condition diagnosed.

TerraCore:hasEthnicity.title: has ethnicity
TerraCore:hasEthnicity.comment: Considering using HANCESTRO ancestry category subclasses as options here.  In the meantime, capturing a text string.  Also consider whether we need to track reported and genetic as determined by genetic analysis.
TerraCore:hasEthnicity.description: A property that relects a HumanDonor's reported ethnic origin.

TerraCore:hasChild.title: hasChild
TerraCore:hasChild.description: A property that identifies genetic children.

TerraCore:hasAgeAtDeath.title: hasAgeAtDeath
TerraCore:hasAgeAtDeath.description: A reference to the Age of the Donor at time of death.

TerraCore:hasRace.title: hasRace
TerraCore:hasRace.comment: Considering using HANCESTRO ancestry category subclasses as options here.  In the meantime, capturing a text string.  Also consider whether we need to track reported and genetic as determined by genetic analysis.
TerraCore:hasRace.description: A property that relects a HumanDonor's reported race.

title: HumanDonor
